value.title: StarCraft 2: TOP-LEVEL PROTOSS VS TERRAN! (Trap vs TY)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Trap and TY. While TY is overall higher ranked than Trap, Trap's Protoss versus Terran matchup is the best in the world. value.title: StarCraft 2: Very STRANGE Terran Strategies! (Serral vs GuMiho)
value.excerpt: A fun best-of-3 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Serral (Zerg) and GuMiho (Terran). At this point I am fairly certain that GuMiho plays a different strategy in every game he plays. In this best-of-3 series he decides to play Mech, cheesy Marines and a very strange Bio based opener.   Vanya
